c74object.name: cage.explodevoices
c74object.description: Routes the chords of a bach.roll or bach.score to different voices depending on some slot content.

inlet.digest: Gathered syntax of original bach.roll or bach.score

outlet.digest: Gathered syntax of exploded bach.roll or bach.score

objarg.name: slot
objarg.description: Sets the initial number of the slot (of type integer) containing the information about the voice routing. Defaults to 1.

method.name: bang
method.description: Output the result obtained from the most recently received input data.

method.name: llll
method.description: An llll in the first inlet is expected to contain the gathered syntax of the whole bach.roll or bach.score (e.g. retrieven via a dump or dump body message). Chords are then routed to the voice number contained in a given slot, set via the slot attribute. Such slot is expected to be of type integer, and to contain the number of the voice to which chords must be routed. The outlet of cage.explodevoices must be linked with a new bach.roll or bach.score. A numvoices message is then sent to proprely change the number of voices depending on the original data, and then an llll containing the gathered syntax of the whole exploded notation object is output.

attribute.name: slot
attribute.description: Number of the slot (of type integer) containing the information about the voice routing. Defaults to 1.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: Gathered syntax of original bach.roll or bach.score.

entry.name: Outlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: Gathered syntax of exploded bach.roll or bach.score.
